pages.about: VRVelocityCircuit | About Us Servises About Us Contact About Us VRVelocityCircuit is more than just a virtual reality racing center; it's an immersive experience like no other. Established in 20XX, our passion for cutting-edge technology and adrenaline-fueled entertainment drives us to create an unparalleled environment for racing enthusiasts of all ages. Our state-of-the-art facility is equipped with the latest VR technology, offering an extensive selection of virtual racing experiences that push the boundaries of excitement and realism. From high-speed karting on iconic tracks to thrilling multiplayer competitions, there's something for everyone at VRVelocityCircuit. But we're more than just a place to race. We're a community of like-minded individuals who share a love for competition, camaraderie, and the thrill of victory. Whether you're a seasoned racer looking to hone your skills or a newcomer eager to experience the rush of virtual racing for the first time, you'll find a welcoming and supportive atmosphere here. At VRVelocityCircuit, safety is our top priority. Our experienced staff undergo rigorous training to ensure that every aspect of your experience is safe, secure, and enjoyable. From proper equipment fitting to expert guidance on the track, we're committed to providing a safe and exhilarating environment for all our guests. Join us and embark on an unforgettable journey into the world of virtual racing. Whether you're racing against the clock, competing with friends, or simply enjoying the thrill of the ride, VRVelocityCircuit promises an experience you'll never forget. Advantages Immersive Experience Step into a world of excitement and adventure with our immersive virtual reality experiences. State-of-the-Art Technology Experience the thrill of virtual racing with our cutting-edge VR technology and advanced simulation software. Wide Variety of Tracks Choose from a wide selection of tracks and racing options to suit your preferences and skill level. Realistic Racing Experience Feel the adrenaline rush as you race against opponents in a realistic virtual environment. Competitive Multiplayer Challenge your friends or compete against other racers in thrilling multiplayer races. Expert Staff Receive personalized assistance and guidance from our expert staff to enhance your racing experience. Frequently Asked Questions What are your opening hours? Our VRVelocityCircuit center is open from 10:00 AM to 10:00 PM, seven days a week. Do I need to make a reservation? While walk-ins are welcome, we recommend making a reservation in advance to guarantee your spot, especially during peak hours. Is there an age limit for participants? Participants must be at least 10 years old to participate in VR karting. Younger participants may enjoy other VR experiences available at our center. Do you offer group discounts? Yes, we offer group discounts for parties of 10 or more. Contact us for more information on group rates and reservations. Are there any safety regulations I should be aware of? Yes, safety is our top priority. All participants must attend a safety briefing before participating in any VR experiences. Additionally, helmets and safety gear are provided and must be worn at all times. Can I bring my own VR equipment? We encourage participants to use our state-of-the-art VR equipment for the best experience. However, if you have your own compatible equipment, you may bring it, but please note that it must meet our safety and compatibility standards. Do you offer gift cards? Yes, we offer gift cards that can be redeemed for any of our VR experiences. They make the perfect gift for birthdays, holidays, or any special occasion. What payment methods do you accept? We accept all major credit cards, cash, and contactless payments. Testimonials and Recommendations John Doe "The VR karting experience at VRVelocityCircuit was mind-blowing! I felt like a real racer on the track. Highly recommended!" Jane Smith "My kids had a blast at VRVelocityCircuit! The staff was friendly, and the VR games were amazing. We'll definitely be back!" David Johnson "I organized a corporate event at VRVelocityCircuit, and it was a huge success! Everyone had a fantastic time. Thank you for the wonderful experience!" Sarah Williams "The virtual reality games at VRVelocityCircuit are out of this world! I've never experienced anything like it. Can't wait to come back for more!" Michael Brown "Absolutely loved the VR racing experience! The attention to detail and realism are incredible. Will definitely recommend it to all my friends!" Servises About Us Contact Privacy Policy Terms & Conditions

pages.index: VRVelocityCircuit Servises About Us Contact Welcome to VRVelocityCircuit Experience the adrenaline rush like never before with VRVelocityCircuit, where cutting-edge virtual reality technology meets the thrill of kart racing. Step into our immersive world and feel the speed, the excitement, and the competition like never before. At VRVelocityCircuit, we redefine kart racing by merging it with the limitless possibilities of virtual reality. Whether you're a seasoned racer or a newcomer to the track, our state-of-the-art VR simulations offer an exhilarating experience for all skill levels. Prepare to be transported to stunning virtual tracks, where every twist and turn will challenge your skills and push your limits. With Experience VR Karting Like Never Before VRVelocityCircuit introduces a groundbreaking concept in karting, fusing the exhilaration of traditional racing with the immersive capabilities of virtual reality technology. Here's what sets our VR karting experience apart: Immersive VR Simulators: Step into our state-of-the-art VR simulators, where cutting-edge technology transports you to dynamic racing environments filled with twists, turns, and adrenaline-pumping action. Realistic Physics and Controls: Feel the thrill of the race with realistic physics and responsive controls that simulate the sensations of acceleration, braking, and cornering. Customizable Options: Personalize your racing adventure with customizable options, including track layouts, weather conditions, and vehicle settings, ensuring a tailored experience every time you hit the track. Exciting Multiplayer Modes: Challenge your friends and competitors in exciting multiplayer modes, where you can race head-to-head or team up for intense competition and camaraderie. State-of-the-Art Facilities: Immerse yourself in the ultimate VR karting experience in our cutting-edge facilities, designed to enhance your enjoyment and comfort throughout your visit. Whether you're a seasoned racer or a newcomer to the track, VRVelocityCircuit offers thrills and excitement for all skill levels. Prepare to unleash your inner racer and embark on an unforgettable journey into the future of karting! Popular Games Speed Racer VR Race against the clock and other players in this high-speed VR experience. Try Now Virtual Drift Challenge Master the art of drifting in this adrenaline-fueled virtual reality challenge. Try Now Extreme Karting VR Take karting to the next level with intense tracks and fierce competition. Try Now Special Offers Weekend Madness Enjoy discounted rates on weekend bookings! Hurry, limited slots available. Reserve Group Discounts Bring your friends and save with our group discount packages. Perfect for team outings! Reserve Student Specials Calling all students! Enjoy exclusive discounts with our student specials. Reserve Events VR Racing Championship Join us for the ultimate VR racing showdown and compete for glory and prizes! Register Now Virtual Karting Workshop Learn the basics of virtual karting and hone your skills with our expert instructors. Register Now Team Building Event Boost team morale and camaraderie with our adrenaline-fueled team building event. Register Now Servises About Us Contact Privacy Policy Terms & Conditions
pages.policy: Privacy Policy - VRVelocityCircuit main { padding: 50px 0; } p { margin-bottom: 20px; } h1 { margin-bottom: 40px; } h2{ margin-bottom: 20px; } a{ color: #39f9f3; } a:hover{ text-decoration: underline; } Servises About Us Contact Privacy Policy This Privacy Policy tells You about Your privacy rights and how the law protects You. Interpretation and Definitions Interpretation The words of which the initial letter is capitalized have meanings defined under the following conditions. The following definitions shall have the same meaning regardless of whether they appear in singular or in plural. Definitions For the purposes of this Privacy Policy: Account means a unique account created for You to access our Service or parts of our Service. Affiliate means an entity that controls, is controlled by or is under common control with a party, where "control" means ownership of 50% or more of the shares, equity interest or other securities entitled to vote for election of directors or other managing authority. Company (referred to as either "the Company", "We", "Us" or "Our" in this Agreement) refers to VRVelocityCircuit. Device means any device that can access the Service such as a computer, a cellphone or a digital tablet. Service refers to the Website. Service Provider means any natural or legal person who processes the data on behalf of the Company. It refers to third-party companies or individuals employed by the Company to facilitate the Service, to provide the Service on behalf of the Company, to perform services related to the Service or to assist the Company in analyzing how the Service is used. You means the individual accessing or using the Service, or the company, or other legal entity on behalf of which such individual is accessing or using the Service, as applicable. Data Security We take appropriate measures to protect the security of your information. However, please be aware that no data transmission over the internet is completely secure, and we cannot guarantee the security of information transmitted to our website. Links to Other Websites Our Service may contain links to other websites that are not operated by Us. If You click on a third party link, You will be directed to that third party's site. We strongly advise You to review the Privacy Policy of every site You visit. We have no control over and assume no responsibility for the content, privacy policies or practices of any third party sites or services. Changes to this Privacy Policy We may update Our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify You of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. We will let You know via email and/or a prominent notice on Our Service, prior to the change becoming effective and update the "Last updated" date at the top of this Privacy Policy. You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes. Changes to this Privacy Policy are effective when they are posted on this page. Contact Us If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, You can contact us: By email: VRVelocityCircuit@gmail.com By phone number: +916478204431 By mail: C-33/52-9A1A Chittupur Road Near Dalimms Sunbeam School Chittupur, Sigra, Varanasi, Uttar Pradesh 221010, India Servises About Us Contact Privacy Policy Terms & Conditions
pages.servises: VRVelocityCircuit | Servises Servises About Us Contact Our Services Discover a world of possibilities with our range of services tailored to elevate your VR karting experience. From individual race sessions to corporate events, we offer: Exciting VR karting experiences for all skill levels Customizable event packages to suit your needs Professional instructors to guide you every step of the way State-of-the-art facilities equipped with the latest technology And much more! Contact Us Entertainment Experience the thrill of VRVelocityCircuit's entertainment options that cater to all ages and preferences. Whether you're a solo racer, a group of friends, or planning a corporate event, we have something for everyone. Virtual Arcade Step into our virtual arcade and explore a variety of games and experiences beyond karting. Party Packages Celebrate your special occasion with our customizable party packages, complete with VR gaming and more. Special Events Join us for special events throughout the year, including tournaments, themed nights, and more. Coaching Sessions Refine your skills with personalized coaching sessions led by experienced instructors. Family Fun Create lasting memories with our family-friendly VR experiences suitable for all ages. Team Building Foster teamwork and camaraderie with our interactive team building activities and challenges. Track Description Experience the thrill of VRVelocityCircuit's dynamic track, designed to challenge both novice and seasoned racers. Our track features: Multiple layouts for varied racing experiences Realistic terrain and scenery for immersive racing Advanced safety features for worry-free racing State-of-the-art timing system for accurate lap tracking And much more! Whether you're a casual racer or a competitive enthusiast, our track offers excitement and adrenaline for all. Prices Single Race Experience a thrilling single race session. $25 Double Race Double the excitement with two race sessions. $45 Group Package Perfect for groups, includes multiple race sessions and exclusive use of the track. $150 Family Pack Enjoy a fun-filled family day out with discounted rates for families. $80 Membership Unlock exclusive benefits and discounts with our membership plans. Starting from $200/year Corporate Events Host your corporate events with us and enjoy tailored packages for team building and more. Customized pricing Subscriptions Monthly Pass Enjoy unlimited access to VR karting for a month. $100/month Annual Pass Get the best value with a yearly subscription. $800/year Family Plan Includes memberships for the whole family with discounted rates. $150/month Corporate Membership Customized plans for corporate memberships with exclusive benefits. Custom pricing Certificates VR Karting Experience Certificate Give the gift of excitement with our VR Karting Experience Certificate! This certificate entitles the holder to a thrilling VR karting session at our state-of-the-art facility. Perfect for birthdays, holidays, or any special occasion, our certificate guarantees an unforgettable experience for racing enthusiasts of all ages. Price: $50 Purchase Now Family Fun Certificate Treat your family to an exciting day out with our Family Fun Certificate! Enjoy a day of VR karting and other thrilling experiences at our entertainment center. Our certificate offers a discounted rate for families, making it the perfect choice for quality family time. Price: $80 Purchase Now Corporate Event Certificate Host a memorable corporate event with our Corporate Event Certificate! Treat your team to an adrenaline-fueled day of VR karting and team building activities. Our certificate includes exclusive access to our facilities and customizable packages to suit your company's needs. Price: Customized pricing Purchase Now VR Experience Gift Card Give the gift of adventure with our VR Experience Gift Card! This card can be redeemed for any of our VR experiences, including VR karting, virtual arcade, and more. Perfect for any occasion, our gift card ensures excitement and fun for the recipient. Available in denominations of $25, $50, and $100. Buy Now Servises About Us Contact Privacy Policy Terms & Conditions
pages.terms: Terms & Conditions - VRVelocityCircuit main { padding: 50px 0; } p { margin-bottom: 20px; } h1 { margin-bottom: 40px; } h2{ margin-bottom: 20px; } a{ color: #39f9f3; } a:hover{ text-decoration: underline; } Servises About Us Contact Terms & Conditions Welcome to VRVelocityCircuit's Terms & Conditions. VRVelocityCircuit and its logos are trademarks or registered trademarks of VRVelocityCircuit.
